新目的：open an access to each users's dictionnary

well there is one that I don't use XD
I record the new words inputed by the user in a sqlite DB
where do you put the sqlite DB files?
somewhere in /data/appname/.../
oh.. locally
there is a built-in way to create and access sqlite DB in the android API
i see. sounds convenient :D
yep it's not a cordova app
it's native, I'm not sure whether cordova has bindings and access to the IME API
guess not
but the sharing app could be made in cordova
like https://github.com/lite4cordova/Cordova-SQLitePlugin we need a plugin
